languages.english-overview:
XMB is a lightweight PHP forum software with all the features you need to support a growing community. With outstanding community support and contribution, you will find XMB to be easy to setup, customize, and enhance.
XMB is available to anyone under the GNU/GPL license.

english-features.p: Though XMB is lightweight out of the box, it offers the key features you need to get your message board up and running

ul.li: Forum Organization with Categories, Forums & Sub-Forums
Anti-spam image verification for registration and anonymous posting

english-features.p: These are just some of the many features included in XMB.
